title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. I, pt. 495 - Sulfur Hexafluoride Standards and Reporting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. I, pt. 495 - Sulfur Hexafluoride Standards and Reporting

State Regulations

Subpart 495-1 - Requirements for Users of Gas-Insulated Equipment (§ 495-1.1 to 495-1.15)

Subpart 495-2 - Requirements for Users and Suppliers of Regulated Substances and Products Containing Regulated Substances (§ 495-2.1 to 495-2.5)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. I, pt. 495

Adopted

New

York State Register December 24, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 52, eff. 1/9/2025

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§ 1-0101, 1-0303, 3-0301, 19-0103, 19-0105, 19-0107, 19-0301, 19-0303, 19-0305, 71-2103, 71-2105, 75-0101, 75-0105, 75-0107, 75-0109

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. I, pt. 495

New York State Register December 24, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 52, eff. 1/9/2025
